div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Jan. 17, 1909. NORWEGIAN HOME FOR THE AGEDReport of the Ladies' Aid Society

body.p: Another year has been added to the history of our Society for a Home for the Aged. We have gathered at our annual meeting to present reports on work done, to give account as to the condition of the Home and our Society, and to encourage each other to vigorous continuation of the work.

The reports will show that our various undertakings for the benefit of the Home have been well supported by the friends of the work...and we wish to thank all those who have assisted in making this part of the work a success.
The secretary and treasurer for the Ladies' Aid Society report that the following amounts have been paid to the treasurer of the Home Society:

row.cell: Annual festival at Wicker Park Church
